text: Hot Shots! is a 1991 comedy film directed by Jim Abrahams, co-director of Airplane!, and written by Abrahams and Pat Proft. It stars Charlie Sheen, Cary Elwes, Valeria Golino, Lloyd Bridges, Jon Cryer, Kevin Dunn, Kristy Swanson, and Bill Irwin.  It was followed by a sequel, Hot Shots! Part Deux in 1993. The film is primarily a parody of Top Gun, with some scenes spoofing other popular films, including 9½ Weeks, Dances with Wolves, Marathon Man, Rocky, Superman and Gone with the Wind.
